original_text:
Set the trumpet to your lips!
    One like a vulture is over the house of the Lord,
because they have transgressed my covenant
    and rebelled against my law.
korean_text: 나팔을 네 입에 댈지어다 원수가 독수리처럼 여호와의 집에 덮치리니 이는 그들이 내 언약을 어기며 내 율법을 범함이로다

sentences.original_text: Set the trumpet to your lips!
One like a vulture is over the house of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 독수리 같은 자가 주의 집 위에 있으니,

sentences.original_text: because they have transgressed my covenant
